gurmukhi: ਤਬ ਤਿਨ ਭੂਪਤਿ ਬਾਨ ੲਿਕ ਕਾਨ ਪ੍ਰਮਾਨ ਸੁ ਤਾਨ ॥ ਲਖਿ ਮਾਰਿਓ ਸ਼ਿਵ ੳੁਰ ਬਿਖੈ ਅਰਿ ਬਧ ਹਿਤ ਜਾਨ ॥੧੫੧੪॥
transliteration: Tab Tin Bhoopat(i) Baan Ik Kaan Pramaan Su Taan|| Lakh(i) Maario Shiv Ur Bikhai Ar(i) Badh Hit Heeya Jaan||1514||,
translation: The king, making Shiva his target, pulled his bow upto his ear, discharged an arrow towards his heart in order to kill him certainly.1514.

gurmukhi: ਜਬ ਹਰਿ ਕੇ ੳੁਰ ਤਿਨ ਸਰ ਮਾਰਯੋ ॥ ੲਿਹ ਬਿਕ੍ਰਮ ਸ਼ਿਵ ਸੈਨ ਨਿਹਾਰਯੋ ॥ ਕਾਰਤਕੇਯ ਨਿਜ ਦਲੁ ਲੈ ਧਾਯੋ ॥ ਗਨ ਗਨੇਸ਼ ਮਨ ਕੋਪ ਬਢਾਯੋ ॥੧੫੧੫॥
transliteration: Jah Har(i) Ke Ur Tin Sar Mdaryo|| Eh Bikram Shiv Sain Nihdaryo|| Kaartkeya Nij Dal(u) Lai Dhaayo|| Gad Gadesh Man Kop Badhaayo||1515||
translation: When he discharged his arrow towards the heart of Shiva and at the same time, that mighty one looked towards the army of Shiva; Kartikeya was coming speedily alongwith his army and the ganas of Ganesh were getting extremely infuriated.1515.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਵਤ ਹੀ ਦੁਹ ਕੋ ਲਖ ਭੂਪਤ ਜੀ ਅਪਨੇ ਅਤਿ ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਬਢਾਯੋ ॥ ਪੳੁਰਖ ਕੈ ਭੁਜਦੰਡਨ ਕੋ ਸਿਖਿ ਬਾਹਨ ਕੋ ੲਿਕੁ ਬਾਨ ਲਗਾਯੋ ॥
transliteration: Oovat Hiduh Ko Lakh Bhoopat Jiapne At(i) Darodh Badhaayo Paurakh Kai Bhujdanndan Ko Sikh(i) Baahan Ko Ik(u) Baan Lagadyo||
translation: Seeing both of them coming, the king was extremely enraged in his mind and with the strength of his arms, he struck an arrow on their vehicle;

gurmukhi: ਅੳੁਰ ਜਿਤੋ ਗਨ ਕੋ ਦਲੁ ਅਾਵਤ ਸੋ ਛਿਨ ਮੈ ਜਮ ਧਾਮ ਪਠਾਯੋ ॥ ਅਾੲਿ ਖੜਾਨਨ ਕੋ ਜਬ ਹੀ ਗਜ ਅਾਨਨ ਛਾਡਿ ਕੈ ਖੇਤ ਪਰਾਯੋ ॥੧੫੧੬॥
transliteration: Aur Jito Gad Ko Dal(u) Aavat So Chhin Mai Jam Dhaam Pathaayo|| Ooe Khadaanan Ko Jab Higad Aanan Chhaad(i) Kai Khet Paraayo||1516||
translation: He despatched in an instant the army of ganas to the abode of Yama; seeing the king advancing towards Kartikeya, Ganesha also abandoned the battlefield and fled away.1516.

gurmukhi: ਮੋਦ ਭਯੋ ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਕੇ ਮਨ ਮੈ ਜਬ ਹੀ ਸ਼ਿਵ ਕੋ ਦਲੁ ਮਾਰ ਭਜਾਯੋ ॥ ਕਾਹੇ ਕੳੁ ਭਾਜਤ ਰੇ ਡਰਿ ਕੈ ਜਿਨ ਭਾਜਹੁ ੲਿੳੁ ਤਿਹ ਟੇਰ ਸੁਨਾਯੋ ॥
transliteration: Mod Bhayo Nrip Ke Man Mai Jab Hishiv Ko Dal(u) Maar Bhajaayo|| Kaahe Kau Bhaajat Re Dar(i) Kai Jin Bhaajoh Io Tih Ter Sounaayo||
translation: Destroying and forcing the army of Shiva to run away, the king was pleased in his mind and said loudly, “Why all of you are running away in fear?”

gurmukhi: ਸਯਾਮ ਭਨੈ ਖੜਗੇਸ਼ ਤਬੇ ਅਪਨੇ ਕਰਿ ਲੈ ਬਰ ਸੰਖ ਬਜਾਯੋ ॥ ਸ਼ਸਤ੍ਰ ਸੰਭਾਰ ਸਭੈ ਤਬ ਹੀ ਮਨੋ ਅੰਤਕ ਰੂਪ ਕੀੲੇ ਰਨ ਅਾਯੋ ॥੧੫੧੭॥
transliteration: Syaam Bhanai Khadgesh Tabe Apne Kar(i) Lai Bar Sankh Bajaayo|| Shastra Sanbhaar Sabhai Tab Himano Antak Roop Keee Ran Aayo||1517||
translation: Kharag Singh then took his conch in his hand and blew it and he appeared as Yama, carrying his weapons in the battlefied.1517.

gurmukhi: ਟੇਰ ਸੁਨੇ ਸਭ ਫੇਰ ਫਿਰੈ ਕਰਿ ਲੈ ਕਰਵਾਰਨ ਕੋਪ ਹੁੲਿ ਧਾੲੇ ॥ ਲਾਜ ਭਰੇ ਸੁ ਟਰੇ ਨ ਡਰੇ ਤਿਨਹੂੰ ਮਿਲਿ ਕੈ ਸਭ ਸੰਖ ਬਜਾੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Ter Soune Sabh Pher Phirai Kar(i) Lai Karvaaran Kop Hue Dhaae|| Laaj Bhare Su Dare Na Dare Tinhoon Mil(i) Kai Sabh Sankh Bajaae||
translation: When his challenge was heard, then carrying their swords in their hands, the warriors came back to fight; though they were definitely feeling ashamed, but now they stood firmly and fearlessly and they all blew their conches together;

gurmukhi: ਮਾਰ ਹੀ ਮਾਰ ਪੁਕਾਰ ਪਰੈ ਲਲਕਾਰ ਕਹੈ ਅਰਿ ਤੈ ਬਹੁ ਘਾੲੇ ॥ ਮਾਰਤ ਹੈ ਅਬ ਤੋਹਿ ਨ ਛਾਡਤ ਯੋਂ ਕਹਿ ਕੈ ਸਰ ਓਘ ਚਲਾੲੇ ॥੧੫੧੮॥
transliteration: Maar Himaar Poukaar Darai Lalkaar Kahai Ar(i) Tai Bahu Ghaae|| Maarat Hai Ab Tohe Naa Chhaadat Yon Kah(i) Kai Sar Ogh Chadhaae||1518||
translation: With the shouts of “kill, kill” they challenged and said, “O king! you have killed many people; now we shall not leave you, we shall kill you,” saying this, they discharged volleys of arrows.1518.

gurmukhi: ਜਬ ਅਾਨ ਨਿਦਾਨ ਕੀ ਮਾਰ ਮਚੀ ਤਬ ਹੀ ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਅਾਪਨੇ ਸ਼ਸਤ੍ਰ ਸੰਭਾਰੇ ॥ ਖੱਗ ਗਦਾ ਬਰਛੀ ਜਮਧਾਰ ਸੁ ਲੈ ਕਰਵਾਰ ਹੀ ਸ਼ੱਤ੍ਰ ਪਚਾਰੇ ॥
transliteration: Jab Aan Nidaan Kimaar Machitab Hinrip Aapne Shastra Sanbhdare|| Khagg Gadaa Barchhijamdhaar Su Lai Karvaar Hishattra Pachdare||
translation: When there was dreadful destruction, the king held up his weapons and carrying the dagger, mace, lance, axe and sword in his hands, he challenged the enemy;
